body:

### Steps to reproduce

I don't have steps to reproduce. 
Not 100% sure if it is related to this plugin https://github.com/luukvbaal/statuscol.nvim/issues

### Expected behavior

The application should not crash

### Neovim version (nvim -v)

0.10.0 2cd76a758b4511748d9482e5af58162a608516b4

### Vim (not Nvim) behaves the same?

no

### Operating system/version

macOS 14.1.1

### Terminal name/version

x

### $TERM environment variable

xterm-256color

### Installation

build from repo

comment_data.body: Thanks @luukvbaal closing this issue. This crash was also triggered by an undo change.

I still get the bug when delete lines or undo stuff

neovim 0.11.4-1

/usr/src/debug/neovim/neovim/src/nvim/decoration.c:1071: buf_signcols_count_range: Assertion `buf->b_signcols.count[prevwidth - 1] >= 0' failed.

I'm still getting this error multiple times a day when doing the same: fast undo/redo operations and deleting lines, visual selections.

Still seems random enough that I can't reliably reproduce.

neovim v0.11.4

This bug happens to me randomly — and quite often! It makes Neovim practically unusable for me.

NVIM v0.11.4

labels.description: issue reporting a crash or segfault
labels.name: bug-crash

title: Assertion failed: (buf->b_signcols.count[prevwidth - 1] >= 0)
